name: Car Prize
description: Win a brand new car or equivalent cash value!
image prompt: A gleaming, luxury sport utility vehicle (SUV) parked under spotlights on a game show stage, massive confetti falling.

name: Luxury Safari Trip
description: An incredible 10-day luxury safari experience for two in Africa.
image prompt: A high-end safari jeep viewing a herd of elephants at sunset in the Serengeti, luxurious tent camp visible in the background.

name: Super Jackpot
description: An extremely rare, massive cash prize!
image prompt: An overflowing vault of gold bars and massive stacks of currency, blindingly bright light reflecting off the wealth, representing the ultimate prize.

name: High-Value Jewelry Set
description: A dazzling diamond necklace and earring set.
image prompt: A brilliant, multi-carat diamond necklace and matching earrings sparkling brightly against a dark velvet background.

name: Luxury Yachting Vacation
description: An all-inclusive week-long luxury yachting trip for two.
image prompt: A pristine white luxury yacht sailing smoothly on turquoise water during sunset, tropical backdrop.

name: Luxury Watch Set
description: A set of two high-end, designer wristwatches (his and hers).
image prompt: Two elegant, gold and stainless steel luxury wristwatches resting on a black velvet cushion, close-up, high-end photography.

name: Home Gym Equipment
description: A complete set of high-quality, modern home gym equipment.
image prompt: A sleek, futuristic home gym setup with a multi-functional machine and free weights, in a brightly lit, modern room.

name: Grand Prize
description: The top jackpot cash prize!
image prompt: A large, glittering stack of $100 bills and gold coins, dramatically lit, focused shot.

name: Premium Cash Award
description: An excellent cash prize segment.
image prompt: A very tall, perfectly stacked column of crisp dollar bills, sharp focus, suggesting maximum value.

name: Major Cash Award
description: A significant cash prize.
image prompt: A tall, impressive stack of clean $100 bills, studio lighting, suggesting high value.

name: Master Chef Culinary Course
description: All-expenses-paid enrollment in an elite, week-long culinary training program.
image prompt: A professional chef guiding students in a gleaming, stainless steel kitchen, focused on precise knife work on fresh vegetables.

name: Designer Puppy
description: A lovable puppy of a high-end designer breed.
image prompt: An adorable, fluffy, small puppy (like a Golden Doodle or French Bulldog) sitting in a basket with a large red bow, cozy lighting, high detail.

name: Supreme Cash Award
description: A very high cash prize amount.
image prompt: A tightly stacked bundle of fresh $100 bills secured with a golden money clip, highly detailed.

name: Luxury Shopping Spree
description: A large gift certificate for a high-end department store.
image prompt: An elegant woman walking through a luxurious, brightly lit designer boutique, holding several shopping bags.

name: Elite Cash Award
description: An elite level cash award.
image prompt: Three rows of perfectly aligned paper currency on a reflective surface, suggesting precision and high value.

name: High-Performance Gaming PC
description: A custom-built, top-tier gaming computer system.
image prompt: A powerful desktop gaming PC with clear side panels showing glowing RGB components, surrounded by glowing peripherals.

name: High-End Electronic Device
description: Win a high-end electronic device or vacation voucher.
image prompt: A sleek, modern, high-end electronic device (like a large curved monitor or designer watch) on a velvet pedestal, luxurious setting.

name: State-of-the-Art Robotic Vacuum
description: The latest model, fully autonomous floor cleaning and mopping robot.
image prompt: A futuristic, sleek black and silver robotic vacuum gliding silently across a hardwood floor in a clean, modern home.

name: Grand Cash Award
description: A grand level cash prize.
image prompt: A cascade of gold coins falling onto a large stack of $50 bills, dynamic lighting.

name: Professional Camera Kit
description: A DSLR or mirrorless camera with multiple lenses and accessories.
image prompt: A professional-grade mirrorless camera with a large telephoto lens resting on a tripod, in a minimalist studio setting.

name: Distinguished Cash Prize
description: A distinguished high-level cash prize.
image prompt: A close-up of the security ribbon on a high denomination bill, emphasizing the value and quality of the money.

name: Premium Home Appliance Set
description: A set of high-end kitchen appliances like a stand mixer and espresso machine.
image prompt: A gleaming, stainless steel espresso machine next to a matching stand mixer on a clean kitchen counter, bright morning light.

name: Home Entertainment System
description: A top-of-the-line television and soundbar package.
image prompt: A large, ultra-thin 4K TV screen showing a vivid movie scene, surrounded by high-quality speakers in a modern living room setting.

name: Substantial Cash Award
description: A very respectable cash win.
image prompt: Three neat bundles of paper currency secured with bands, elevated on a platform, crisp and clean.

name: World-Class Chef's Knife Set
description: A complete set of handcrafted Japanese or German chef's knives in a custom block.
image prompt: A set of six immaculate, razor-sharp chef's knives in a sleek wooden magnetic knife block on a dark wood countertop.

name: High Cash Prize
description: A solid high cash prize.
image prompt: A small leather money pouch slightly open, revealing a large amount of rolled cash inside.

name: High-End Road Bicycle
description: A lightweight carbon fiber road bike for performance cycling.
image prompt: A sleek, modern carbon fiber road racing bicycle standing against a clean white wall, focused on the lightweight frame and components.

name: Significant Cash Award
description: A large cash segment.
image prompt: Two large stacks of cash prominently displayed, conveying immediate financial boost.

name: Premium Cash Payout
description: A premium cash payout.
image prompt: A pattern made of four overlapping piles of different denomination bills, neat and symmetrical.

name: Advanced Drone Package
description: A professional-grade quadcopter drone with 4K camera and extra batteries.
image prompt: A high-tech quadcopter drone hovering over a scenic landscape, showing its compact design and powerful camera.

name: Excellent Cash Prize
description: An excellent cash prize.
image prompt: A small chest slightly ajar, with a glow emanating from the pile of cash inside.

name: Professional Coffee Station
description: A high-end automatic espresso maker and grinder set.
image prompt: A sleek, chrome professional espresso machine steaming gently on a dark counter, with a perfect cup of coffee being brewed.

name: Valuable Cash Award
description: A valuable cash prize segment.
image prompt: A distinct pile of cash with a few bills peeling off the top, suggesting accessibility and readiness to spend.

name: Premium Electric Scooter
description: A top-tier, foldable electric scooter perfect for fast urban commuting.
image prompt: A sleek, black and silver premium electric scooter parked on a city sidewalk, ready for a commute, minimalist design.

name: Exotic Pet Parrot
description: Win a beautiful, talking pet parrot and cage.
image prompt: A brightly colored, vibrant pet parrot (like a Macaw) perched on a stand next to an ornate cage, tropical background, high detail.
